titles.title: Expressing support for the goals and ideals of Children's Book Week.
Expressing support for the goals and ideals of Children's Book Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Ms. Woolsey moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1333.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Supports the goals and ideals of Children's Book Week.
Encourages parents to read with their children and schools, libraries, and community organizations to hold events to encourage children and students of all ages to read.
